name: Livestock Leaders
title: Top Livestock Production Index
description: In 2022, Malawi achieved a remarkable livestock production index of 190.08, showcasing its strength in agricultural productivity.

name: Patent Paucity
title: Lowest Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: In 2016, Malawi recorded just 1 patent application by nonresidents, indicating limited foreign innovation engagement.

name: Crowded Classrooms
title: Highest Pupil-Teacher Ratio in Secondary Education
description: With a pupil-teacher ratio of 72.31 in 2018, Malawi faces challenges in providing individualized attention in secondary education.

name: Costly Connections
title: High Transaction Costs for Remittances
description: In 2023, the average transaction cost for sending remittances to Malawi was -49.69%, highlighting inefficiencies in financial services.

name: Economic Ebb
title: Negative Growth in Per Capita Income
description: Malawi experienced a -6.11% growth rate in per capita income in 2019, reflecting economic challenges for its population.

name: Child Labor Lowdown
title: Minimal Child Employment in Manufacturing
description: In 2015, child employment in manufacturing was notably low, with only 0.07% of children aged 7-14 engaged in such activities.

name: Part-Time Predominance
title: High Rates of Part-Time Employment
description: In 2020, 76.09% of Malawi's workforce was employed part-time, with 82.82% of females and 69.59% of males working part-time.

name: Export Enigma
title: Negligible Merchandise Export Residuals
description: In 2020, Malawi's merchandise exports had a residual value close to zero, indicating a lack of surplus in trade.
